title: Yellen Calls for ‘Stabilizing’ U.S. Relations With China Ahead of G20
description: The Treasury secretary said in an interview that the United States was not trying to “paralyze China’s economy and stop its development.”
dc:creator: Alan Rappeport
media:description: Treasury Secretary Janet L. Yellen called for stabilizing America’s relationship with China ahead of meetings between top U.S. and Chinese leaders at the Group of 20 summit next week.
